Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I am a long-time kerbonaut but still consider myself an amateur at the program. I originally downloaded it because I have always been interested in space and plan to go into aerospace engineering, and since then I have gotten hooked! Looking forward to learning a lot.

Hi noncents, welcome to the community

You have arrived just in time for the 0.17 version with all the new planets, the servers are slow at the moment though so downloading is difficult, maybe wait until things get back to normal.
